nodes.text: Darth Vader 10 is the tenth issue of the canon comic series Star Wars: Darth Vader. It was  written by Greg Pak, illustrated by Raffaele Ienco, and published by Marvel Comics on February 10, 2021.
On the final page of the comic, in which Darth Vader 11 is advertised, the issue is incorrectly referred to as "INTO THE FIRE" PART V, instead of PART VI.
